title: Tall Building Inventory
description: Inventory of tall buildings in San Francisco, focusing on attributes that are relevant to building performance during an earthquake or to post-earthquake recovery. Where possible, the attributes were collected from permitting documents at the Department of Building Inspections. As of October 1, 2018, this database includes a complete list of the 156 buildings taller than 240 ft, as well as another 24 buildings over 160 ft. For more information on the Tall Building Safety Strategy, see http://OneSanFrancisco.org/Resilient-SF. If you find any errors or emissions in this database, please contact us at cpp@sfgov.org. For any other issues, please scroll down to "contact the dataset owner" on this page.

columns.name: OBJECTID
columns.description: System ID generated by Esri software

columns.name: polygon
columns.description: The geometry of the buildin

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Name of the building

columns.name: Address
columns.description: Street address of the building

columns.name: MapBlockLot
columns.description: The block and lot number of the representative parcel for the building

columns.name: MBL_Unique
columns.description: The MapBlockLot (MBL) number, modified with a cardinal direction if multiple buildings share the same MBL

columns.name: Date
columns.description: Building's year of construction

columns.name: Retrofit_Date
columns.description: Year the building was seismically retrofit, if known

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Description of basic building characteristics

columns.name: Height_ft
columns.description: Height of the building, in feet

columns.name: Stories_Above_Grade
columns.description: Number of stories above ground level

columns.name: Stories_Below_Grade
columns.description: Number of stories below ground level

columns.name: Occupancy
columns.description: Occupancy type of building, consistent with San Francisco's Land Use categorization

columns.name: Structural_Material
columns.description: Structural material of the building (Steel, Reinforced Concrete, or Mixed)

columns.name: Structural_System
columns.description: Lateral Force Resisting System (LFRS) of the building

columns.name: Structural_Types
columns.description: Broad categorization of the LFRS (Steel Moment Frame, Steel Braced Frame, RC Shear Wall)

columns.name: Facade_Material
columns.description: Fa√ßade material, classified by visual identification

columns.name: Foundation_System
columns.description: Type of foundation system used

columns.name: BORP_Report
columns.description: Is the building part of Building Occupancy Resumption Program (BORP)

columns.name: Instrumented
columns.description: Is the building seismically instrumented to record earthquake motion?

columns.name: Square_Footage
columns.description: Square footage of the building (from Feb. 2018 SFFD records. Not all buildings have a match.)

columns.name: Fire_Resistence_Type
columns.description: Fire resistance of building materials (from Feb. 2018 SFFD records. Not all buildings have a match.)

columns.name: Percent_Sprinklered
columns.description: Percentage of building with sprinklers installed (from Feb. 2018 SFFD records. Not all buildings have a match.)

columns.name: Liquefaction_Potential
columns.description: Classification of the liquefaction potential at the building's centroid (Very High to Very Low)

columns.name: BedrockDepth_MEAN
columns.description: Mean depth to bedrock over the building's footprint (based on a 1961 USGS bedrock map and current day topographic data)

columns.name: BedrockDepth_MAX
columns.description: Maximum depth to bedrock over the building's footprint (based on a 1961 USGS bedrock map and current day topographic data)

columns.name: BedrockDepth_MIN
columns.description: Minimum depth to bedrock over the building's footprint (based on a 1961 USGS bedrock map and current day topographic data)

columns.name: Permit_Date_1
columns.description: Year of any date stamps found on the permit documents

columns.name: Permit_Date_2
columns.description: Year of any date stamps found on the permit documents

columns.name: Permit_Date_3
columns.description: Year of any date stamps found on the permit documents

columns.name: Completion_Date
columns.description: Year of completion (from a CFC document or, if not other date is available, from Emporis)

columns.name: Building_Code_Year
columns.description: The date of the applicable design code (if noted)

columns.name: Base_Plan_Size
columns.description: Dimensions of the plan at ground level

columns.name: Tower_Plan_Size
columns.description: Dimensions of the plan for the tower

columns.name: Typ_Story_Height
columns.description: Height of typical story

columns.name: Attyp_Story_Height
columns.description: Any unique story heights

columns.name: Architectural_Notes
columns.description: Description of any relevant architectural features (set backs, plan shape, etc)

columns.name: Atrium_Location
columns.description: Story on which an atrium is located

columns.name: MEP_levels
columns.description: Story on which MEP equipment is located

columns.name: Site_Class
columns.description: Site class, if noted

columns.name: Foundation_Info
columns.description: Additional description of the foundation

columns.name: Collected_on
columns.description: Date the data was collected

columns.name: Primary_Source
columns.description: Primary source the data was collected from (BORP reports, DBI permits, Emporis, Peer Reviewers)

columns.name: Shape_Length
columns.description: Footprint geometry info (in feet)

columns.name: Shape_Area
columns.description: Footprint geometry info (in sqft)
